title: 'Free D.C.': Protesters gather amid Trump's U.S. capital takeover
shortDescription: See protesters rally near the White House after President Donald Trump's seizure of Washington, D.C.

title: Trump offers Putin, Zelenskyy contrasting approaches
shortDescription: Trump's dealmaking style offers contrasting treatment of a U.S. ally and adversary in his peace gambit

title: Zelenskyy to meet Trump in DC Monday
shortDescription: Ukrainian President Zelenskyy confirmed a meeting with President Trump at the White House Monday to discuss ending Russia’s war after the Alaska summit with Trump and Putin.

title: Notice a theme to Trump's takeover of cities? These Black mayors do.
shortDescription: President Trump has warned he might send the National Guard to other cities. The Black mayors of those cities vow to push back.

title: Trump and Zelenskyy to meet at White House Monday after Putin summit
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is abandoning his pursuit of a ceasefire between Russia and Ukraine and pushing for a peace deal after his Putin summit.

title: From no-deal to Putin's deal? A flummoxing summit, a Trump flip
shortDescription: The frustration on President Trump's face after talks with Putin was something his presidential predecessors would have recognized.

title: Trump leaves Alaska with 'no deal': Takeaways from Putin summit
shortDescription: Trump rolled out the red carpet for Putin in Alaska to reach a breakthrough on ending the war in Ukraine. He left without a peace deal.

title: Trump calls Alaska summit 'very productive'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump called the Alaska summit with Russian President Vladimir Putin “very productive," but said "there's no deal."

title: Judge leaves Trump in charge of DC police through orders to mayor
shortDescription: U.S. District Judge Ana Reyes refused to block Trump's takeover of DC police but said federal changes in policing must go through the mayor.

title: Zelenskyy urges Trump to show strength at summit
shortDescription: Ukraine's Volodymyr Zelenskyy urged President Donald Trump to take a strong stance at the Alaska summit with Russian President Vladimir Putin.

title: See President Trump meet Russian President Vladimir Putin in Alaska
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and Russian leader Vladimir Putin met at a U.S. military base in Alaska amid Russia's ongoing invasion of Ukraine.

title: Putin and Trump meet in Alaska
shortDescription: The president shook hands with Russian President Vladimir Putin upon their arrival in Alaska to discuss the war in Ukraine.

title: Putin teases new nuke deal ahead of meeting with Trump
shortDescription: The final pillar of a once-robust set of arms control treaties between the U.S. and Russia expires in six months.

title: Trump wants ceasefire before Putin summit
shortDescription: President Donald Trump called for an immediate ceasefire before meeting Putin, saying Europe won't dictate terms.

title: Here's Melania's story on how she met Donald Trump
shortDescription: Hunter Biden is claiming Jeffrey Epstein introduced Melania and Donald Trump, prompting legal threats from the first lady. How did Trump meet Melania?

title: Obama calls Texas GOP redistricting an 'assault' on democracy
shortDescription: As Texas battle over Republicans' attempts to redraw congressional maps persists, former President Barack Obama wades further in to support Democrats.

title: What time is Trump's meeting with Putin? See full schedule, livestream
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is scheduled to meet face-to-face with Vladimir Putin on Aug. 15 in an effort to end the Ukraine war.

title: DC sues President Trump to halt federal takeover of police department
shortDescription: The lawsuit brought by Washington says Trump exceeded his authority under the Home Rule Act of 1973 in taking over the Metropolitan Police Department.

title: President Trump departs for Putin meeting in Alaska
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is traveling to Alaska for a "high-stakes" meeting with Russian President Vladimir Putin to discuss a Ukraine ceasefire.

title: See the scene in Alaska, Ukraine as Trump-Putin meeting sparks protest
shortDescription: Ukraine supporters hold rallies ahead of President Donald Trump's meeting with Russian President Vladmir Putin at Elmendorf military base.

title: 'No deal': Live updates from Trump-Putin Alaska summit
shortDescription: There were handshakes and a red carpet, but not the deal that Trump had sought on the grinding three-year war in Ukraine.

title: Bromance to bitterness: Trump-Putin relationship full of twisted turns
shortDescription: After a summer of phone calls and public outbursts against Russia's leader, President Donald Trump will meet in Alaska with Vladimir Putin.

title: Trump-Putin summit sparks Alaska protest
shortDescription: Anchorage residents protested the Trump-Putin summit, questioning progress on Ukraine peace talks in Alaska.
